title: How to write 900 million dollars - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A Do help yourself with that problem, do you know how to write 1,000,000? A million needs 6 zeros in the answer. So how do you write 90,000,000? You do what you did for 1,000,000. Just put the 90 where you put the 1 in the first problem. Just to help you with the next question regarding numbers, your question should be stated this way : How do you write 900- million dollars using numbers? The reason I know this is that I taught 5th and 6th grade math for 30 years.

$900 million (if you are writing it in text, like in a paragraph. $900,000,000 if you are writing it in a business or mathematical context. (The dollar sign $ always comes before the number, but it is always read after the number. So $900 million is read “nine hundred million dollars.)
